Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Contact Brad Pitt plus 59,000+ celebrities, influencers, and public figures using our online database.

How is Brad Pitt connected to Angelina Jolie?

Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie were a high-profile couple who met while filming ‚ÄúMr. & Mrs. Smith‚Äù in 2004. They married in 2014 and have six children together. However, their relationship ended in 2016 when Jolie filed for divorce, leading to ongoing legal battles over custody and property.

How is Brad Pitt connected to George Clooney?

Brad Pitt and George Clooney are connected through their long-standing friendship and professional collaboration in Hollywood. They have co-starred in several successful films, most notably the ‚ÄúOcean‚Äôs‚Äù series, and have worked together on projects over the years. Their camaraderie extends off-screen, with both actors often speaking highly of each other in interviews.

How is Brad Pitt connected to Jennifer Aniston?

Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston were married from 2000 to 2005. They met in 1998 and quickly became one of Hollywood‚Äôs most famous couples. Despite their divorce, they have maintained a friendly relationship in recent years.

How is Brad Pitt connected to Keanu Reeves?

Brad Pitt and Keanu Reeves are connected as prominent Hollywood actors and through acquaintances. Brad Pitt also turned down the role of Neo in ‚ÄúThe Matrix,‚Äù which eventually went to Keanu Reeves.

How is Brad Pitt connected to Matt Damon?

Brad Pitt and Matt Damon are connected through their work in the ‚ÄúOcean‚Äù film series, where they played key roles in the ensemble cast. Damon portrayed Linus Caldwell, while Pitt played Rusty Ryan. They have also co-founded the non-profit organization Not On Our Watch, which aims to prevent mass atrocities and human rights violations.

How is Brad Pitt connected to Tom Cruise?

Brad Pitt and Tom Cruise are connected because they collaborated on the 1994 film ‚ÄúInterview with the Vampire.‚Äù Despite their professional relationship, reports suggest it has been complicated and sometimes contentious.
